location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 56 of 1857, Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to Government, Bombay Castle

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has a foliation sequence of a small number in the top right hand corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: Letter reports the intended expedition of Sheikh Sultan bin Saggar [Saqr] against the Sheekeeyeen [Sharqiyin] of Dibba to avenge the killing of his grandson. Includes translations of letters from the Sharjah Agent, Haji Yacoob, to Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr.
